short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
description: The procurement requires 10 units of part 74B500062-101 to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal and 10 units of the same part to be delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton. Bidders proposing an equivalent or a substitute product must indicate the Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.
full_summary:
### Aviation Replacement Parts

#### Reference
PW-22-01006242

#### Solicitation Number
W8485-226984/B

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement
The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for replacement parts for aircraft. The detailed requirements for the parts are specified in the attached request for proposal (RFP) documents.

#### Tender Description
Items 1 and 2 details with GSIN 5315 (Nails, Keys and Pins) require the delivery of Pin expanding grip parts to the respective depots. The required quantities are 10 for each item.

*   **Item 1**: 25 CFSD Montreal
*   **Item 2**: 7 CFSD Edmonton

#### Bidding Requirements
*   **Language**: The documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada, English or French.
*   ** Equivalent Products**: Suppliers proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the part number and National Stock Number (NSN) they are offering.

#### Contact Information
*   **Name**: Steve Duval-Urbain
*   **Email**: STEVE.DUVALURBAIN@forces.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: 999-999-9999
*   **Address**: 455 de la carrière, Gatineau, QC, J8Y 6V7, Canada

#### Important Dates
*   **Publication Date**: 2022-09-06
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-09-23T14:00:00

#### Procurement Details
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The request for proposal (RFP) documents can be accessed at the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/06/89da8d776c244afb421fb1e8ae872412/rfp_eng_w8485-226984b_.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/06/89da8d776c244afb421fb1e8ae872412/rfp_eng_w8485-226984b_.pdf) for the English version or [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/06/315be219f736c04b291d10c3b72e50d4/w8485-226984b_rfp_fr.pdf
